title: Second Language Vocabulary and Reading Comprehension Enhancement Through Online Reading Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English grammar and reading comprehension skills, experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Online reading learning environment utilizing integrated (embedded questions within text) and separated (text and questions separated) instructional methods, with optional online dictionary access.

learning_goals: Show a 20% reduction in cognitive load during online reading tasks through integrated/separated instructional methods within four weeks
Improve vocabulary utilization skills by 30% across various text types (explanatory, argumentative, etc.)
Learners apply integrated reading comprehension strategies through project-based assessment, completing and submitting three learning journals.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
